plot: In 1959, while two of history's greatest con artists, Nixon and Khrushchev, trade insults on live TV in the Moscow Kitchen Debate, a grieving widow turns the tables on a pair of con artists who are trying to bilk her out of all her money.
title: One of the Oldest Con Games
plot_es: In 1959, while two of history's greatest con artists, Nixon and Khrushchev, trade insults on live TV in the Moscow Kitchen Debate, a grieving widow turns the tables on a pair of con artists who are trying to bilk her out of all her money.
original_name: One of the Oldest Con Games
